data.text: @SenAngusKing So our contractor who had all local guys working for him should hire visa workers over Maine citizens? We had a young woman who picked berries to supplement her income when we lived in IL she wasn't a visa worker, I washed dishes in a restaurant as a young man. What job exactly
@SenAngusKing Negotiation with Iran is not an option. Not now. Not ever. Not under any circumstances. #R2PforIran #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026  #NoDealWithMullahs  #NoDealWithIRGC

@SenAngusKing Invite them in and they don't leave.  Try to get them to leave and you're called a fascist.  These rich people in Congress care very little about everyday Americans. They take their insider trading and make millions by securing cheap labor for companies.
@SenAngusKing Most people have zero issue with Visas. The issue comes when they overstay, don't behave, or commit a crime.
@SenAngusKing Hey dumb ass, time to reward work and not the fat lazy, welfare leaches.
@SenAngusKing What the hell are you talking about?  You defend foreigners over Mainers?  Go the hell away Anus. You are just as bad as @GovJanetMills
